title: My New and Decent Computer lags ABOVE NORMAL LEVELS ON NORMAL, FAST WIFI
body: So I have a new computer with 1TB of data and an i5 processor with windows 10 by HP. I play with my friends in the same room with great internet and no lag (at least, for them). Whenever I start a queue or am in Champion select I sometimes dc. When I finally do get back and start a game, I have great ping, but all of a sudden.. A HUGE lag spike comes that makes me "attempting to reconnect" or lagging really bad. Whenever this happens, my friends dont get any lag.. Yet i do... My graphics card and Wifi are fine.. I just want to fix this problem immediately because.. I cannot play LoL anymore without feeding, dying, or losing every time as a result of the problem. Please help, thanks!

replies.body: Are you running Discord? A few days ago i  was getting really low FPS that went away when i closed discord.

Even with an awesome rig, you can still have connection problems specifically connecting to specific servers.  If you're having sync issues in champion select as well as delays in-game then something must be hindering the strength of your connection.  I suggest running over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and following each step to fix this up.  I hope that helps!
